subject: Soccer
Movies
lead_paragraph: The film “United Passions,” which is making its American premiere on Friday, is a star-dappled epic about FIFA, underwritten by FIFA and portraying Sepp Blatter as a champion of ethics.
snippet: The film “United Passions,” which is making its American premiere on Friday, is a star-dappled epic about FIFA, underwritten by FIFA and portraying Sepp Blatter as a champion of ethics.
